flavorText:
"In my early experiments in phylactery, I found that fragile forms have their uses."
—Rocati, Duke of Martyne

foreignData.flavorText:
„Bei meinen frühen Experimenten mit Phylakterien konnte ich herausfinden, dass auch zerbrechliche Dinge nützlich sein können."
—Rocati, Herzog von Martyne

"En mis primeros experimentos con filacterias encontré que las formas frágiles tienen su utilidad."
—Rocati, duque de Martyne

« Dans mes premières expériences avec les phylactères, j'ai découvert que même les formes les plus fragiles avaient leur utilité. »
—Rocati, duc de Marteyne

name: Brittle Effigy
originalText: {4}, {T}, Exile Brittle Effigy: Exile target creature.

rulings.text: Brittle Effigy is exiled as a cost to activate its ability, not as part of its effect. If the targeted creature is an illegal target by the time the ability would resolve, the ability doesn’t resolve, but Brittle Effigy remains exiled.

text: {4}, {T}, Exile Brittle Effigy: Exile target creature.
